LagranYue:EnkiduRelics.NAME: Enkidu
LagranYue:EnkiduRelics.FLAVOR: God has opened a window for you!
DESCRIPTIONS: Only once for each battle, when you use the second #yWeapons , retain the effect of the first #yWeapon .

LagranYue:GungnirRelics.NAME: Gungnir
DESCRIPTIONS: In this battle, whenever the #yWeapon is exhausted, the probability of the next one not being exhausted is +1%. The base value is 10%. Maximum 50%

LagranYue:RuleBreakerRelics.NAME: RuleBreaker
LagranYue:RuleBreakerRelics.FLAVOR: This magic weapon is the embodiment of the goddess of betrayal.
DESCRIPTIONS: In this battle, the N #yWeapon plate used will forging 1 times (multiples of N to 3).

LagranYue:UnlimitedBladeWorksRelics.NAME: UnlimitedBladeWorks
LagranYue:UnlimitedBladeWorksRelics.FLAVOR: As a master of weapons, it has the inherent boundaries ability, which is a kind of supreme yearning for weapons.
DESCRIPTIONS: In this battle, whenever you use the #yWeapon card, you get the probability of a #yWeaponMaster + 1%. Base 10%, maximum 20%

LagranYue:DarkRelics.NAME: Dark
LagranYue:DarkRelics.FLAVOR: When you gaze at the abyss, the abyss gazes at you.
DESCRIPTIONS: In this battle, every 7 attack cards are played, #yForging

LagranYue:LuEnRelics.NAME: LuEnRune
LagranYue:LuEnRelics.FLAVOR: Learned the Rune of Lune magic which is popular in Nordic, and will be protected by Rune of Lune magic.
DESCRIPTIONS: In this battle, for each #yWeapon played, 20% got a zero-cost #yLuEnRuneAttack , 20% got a zero-cost #yLuEnRuneDefend and 20% got a zero-cost #yLuEnRuneForging .

LagranYue:ZabaniyaRelics.NAME: Zabaniya
LagranYue:ZabaniyaRelics.FLAVOR: The wrist of curse from darkness. Satan's hand is good at protecting himself.
DESCRIPTIONS: In one round, after playing the second weapon card, gain #yBuffer .

LagranYue:OveredgeRelics.NAME: Overedge
DESCRIPTIONS: If no #yWeapon have been used in this turn,gain [E] next turn.

LagranYue:MagicReflectiveArmorRelic.FLAVOR: 流水很清楚,惜花这个责任

LagranYue:GuideDeadRelic.NAME: Guide to the Dead
